title: polymerbit
author: polymerbit
created_time: March 27, 2023, 02:20:31 PMLast edit: March 31, 2023, 06:39:30 PM by polymerbit
content: Hello! Up for auction are 4 different lots of peculiar polymerbits. LOT 1. 2022 Plan B Lugano Error BTC0.0055An uncut set of three clear window notes misprinted. A rather colourful error caused by a mismatch of HEX codes in the printer. Total of 6 known. Reverse is normal due to being printed on another system. Serial numbers 000000LOT 2. One bitcoin 000 Production Print (keys exposed) BTC0.0035This note was created to test the calibration of the different printers, and the design elements in preparation for the full run.LOT 3. One Bitcoin error note (formerly A29) BTC0.0035Weak impression print and corrupted layer. Artifacts can be seen across the note. LOT 4. Set of three keyless ZUG series 3 notes, no serial number BTC0.0030Bids are in BTC. Starting Bids can be seen on each lot Minimum Bid Increments:  0.0005Auction Ends:  Friday, 31 March 2023 @ 1900 New YorkShipping will be $15 per buyer.

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: Auction closed. Will be contacting winners shortly!
